description:
Our Dayon team at The Attkisson Law Firm, LLC, comprises dedicated, personal injury attorneys. We are ready to stand up against corporations, insurance companies and dishonest drivers in Ohio. Our attorneys have represented thousands of injured persons across the state and have brought these cases to successful closes.

Our clients and cases

We represent clients from all walks of life who wish to hold negligent parties accountable for their injuries. These are some of the many types of cases our clients fall into:

  • Bicycle accidents
  • Catastrophic injuries
  • Premises liability
  • Wrongful death
  • Car crashes
  • Dog bites

Our reputation

Over the years, our colleagues have come to recognize our team as experienced trial lawyers. We have the resources to tackle a case from start to finish. Depending on the circumstances, this might begin with helping clients determine who the negligent party even is. In fact, our law firm won several awards for the services we provide.

Our process

When you reach out to The Attkisson Law Firm, LLC, we begin by evaluating the case. This helps us determine the plausibility of taking it on. If we decide we are a good fit, then we begin our investigations into what happened, when and why. Once we have reviewed all the information, we provide the different courses of legal action, advise you on which one(s) we think is best and await your decision. The first consultation is free.
